rounded-box.description: border radius rounded-box utility class, used in card and other large boxes

rounded-btn.description: border radius rounded-btn utility class, used in buttons and similar element

rounded-badge.description: border radius rounded-badge utility class, used in badges and similar

btn-focus-scale.description: scale transform of button when you focus on it

btn-wide.description: scale transform of button when you focus on it

btn-text-case.description: set default text transform for buttons
